game.name: Train Simulator: Giselabahn: Saalfelden - Wörgl Route Add-On
game.categories: Single-player, Downloadable Content, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Workshop, In-App Purchases, Steam Cloud, Steam Leaderboards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Welcome to Austria! Explore the mountainous countryside of RSSLO’s Giselabahn in Train Simulator, spanning some 80-km and linking multiple towns en-route.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Welcome to Austria! Explore the mountainous countryside of RSSLO’s Giselabahn in Train Simulator, spanning some 80-km and linking multiple towns en-route.
